entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [DependencyInjection] Not exactly a bug, but doesn't seem right - the same object is being disposed multiple times #63967
  • Mono assert hit when calling GetFunctionPointerForDelegate when delegate has Nullable<T> return type #63962
  • [API Proposal]: MetadataReader.GetAssemblyName(string assemblyFile) #63960
  • System.Private.Uri.Functional.Tests crash in CI #63959
  • ILVerify complains about unbox; ldfld #63953
    Future
  • Crash on macOS related to code signing and third-party JIT compilation #63952
  • Explore whether to enable Unix Domain Socket support for Diagnostics Server on Windows #63950
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ExternalContainers.Tests Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug failed #63946
  • Microsoft.ILVerification depends on too low version of System.Reflection.Metadata package #63944
    7.0.0
  • Inline depth of 0 causes an assertion during inlining #63942
    7.0.0
  • Deprecate HttpListener #63941
  • Installation of the .NET 5.0.13 Runtime changes a system information on macOS 12.1 #63938
  • Process.GetProcessById claims killed process is still alive in .NET Core #63937
    7.0.0
  • Different behavior across .NET versions when testing objects for type of IntPtr / nint typed array #63933
  • Cancel tasks in Parallel.Invoke #63973
  • System.Linq support Deconstruct for IGrouping #63919
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #63931
  • Performance regressions due to GC Regions #63930
  • Developers should have a more consistent experience when using System.Text.Json #63918
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WASM JSArrayBufferData exceeds 500MB memory launching through IIS - (Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. RangeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory) #63921
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add virtual Clone method to System.Random #63911
  • InvalidOperationException when using MetadataTypes, AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider & WPF Bindings #63909
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\ServerModel\\servermodel\\servermodel.cmd #63908

Closed

  • [mbr] hot reload doesn't work on lambda bodies #50249
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add UnicodeRanges.ArabicExtendedB to System.Text.Encodings.Web #57609
    7.0.0
  • Use different calender and format info for DateTime.ToString() and DateTime.Parse() #63939
  • DllImportGenerator tests are failing regularly on Mac #63635
  • QUIC: handling of timeouts should be improved #55984
    7.0.0
  • Rate limit APIs #52079
    7.0.0
  • CultureInfo NumberFormat.NegativeSign change from 3.1 to 6.0 #63928
  • [API Proposal]: Add public Architecture enum value for LoongArch64 #63042
  • SSL connection could not be established on Darwin 20.6.0 with legacy HTTP handler #63873
  • Mac OS (arm64) OS Monterey Build Issue #63895
  • Can the CoreCLR library be unloaded from the memory process? #8350
    Future
  • [Performance Improvement]: Add a check for IsEnabled to Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggerExtensions.Log #63907
  • JSON Serializer Source Generator doesn't work #62915

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix case where we incorrectly select a prefix as a FindFirstChar optimization when the pattern includdes an alternation that could lead to different prefixes. #63976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Bump Explicit-layout value types with no fields to at minimum 1 byte size. #63975
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make ILStubGenerated event log ModuleID corresponding to that on other events #63974
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Ensure several helper intrinsics are explicitly marked HW_Flag_BaseTypeFromFirstArg #63972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Failing Globalization Test on OSX #63971
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before object_gennum #63970
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Address follow-up feedback to CachedCompletedInt32Task #63968
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Fix repeatable failure for max CALLSITE_DEPTH #63966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix System.Reflection.Metadata version in ILVerification nuget package metadata #63965
    area-ILVerification
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Do not register ACTIVATION_SIGNAL for secondary PAL copies #63961
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Investigative PR for #51961 #63958
  • Reverse `ASG(CLS_VAR, ...)` #63957
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Crossgen2 bug #61104 and add regression test #63956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63955
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix for Werror=use-after-free in PAL #63954
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63951
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update XUnit to 2.4.2-pre.22 #63948
    area-Meta
  • Disable 2 SMTP tests on checked runtime #63947
    area-System.Net
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Respond to feedback in GenerateMultiTargetRoslynComponentTargetsFile #63943
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update the macOS CoreCLR building documentation #63932
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tests for creating memory mapped files from non-seekable files #63927
    area-System.IO, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add UnreachableException #63922
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • Improve ILLink.targets integration #63914
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(char, char) #63913
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #63912
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono] Hot Reload: initial push to support adding lambdas #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add `UnicodeRange.ArabicExtendedB` #63901
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, community-contribution
  • Update links to the project for DllImportGenerator #63940
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS/tvOS] Remove P/Invokes to libproc from System.Private.CoreLib #63934
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui][iOS/tvOS] Remove P/Invokes to libproc from System.Private.CoreLib #63936
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Revert "Enable GC regions by default (#59283)" #63935
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-maui] [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #63628
    area-System.Net
  • Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63804
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63655
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Split CheckNotDisposed to allow inlining #63863
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0-maui] [mono][debugger] Fix step on ios when using interpreter #63627
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix decoding errors in superpmi script #63929
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce `BasicBlock::KindIs()` for checking bbJumpKind #63203
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create to properly analyze types with nested generic types #63556
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fold coreclr/ToolBox into coreclr/tools #63917
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Extend triage board automation to more pods #63897
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0-maui] [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63629
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Set zero (infinite) options timeout in case of Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #63733
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • improve protocol detection in jail #63565
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-freebsd
  • Remove individual exclusions for DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests in favor of the general one for the entire set of mobile targets #63924
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests test suite on macOS+arm64+CoreCLR #63887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix compilation with older gcc #63721
    community-contribution
  • Delete a few unused PAL APIs #63916
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-maui] [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #63870
    area-System.Security
  • Fix a few IndexOf{Any} uses #63852
    area-Meta
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: don't make a syscall to check hidden on Linux. #63878
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable warnings as errors in the repro project #63910
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-maui] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63896
    area-System.Net.Sockets

Updated

  • Update NativeAOT codegen and Crossgen2 for CreateSpan #63977
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    blocking, area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add runtime-extra-platforms pipeline to have matching runtime PR and Rolling builds #62564
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix formatting of resource string where excess arguments are passed #63824
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add support for libraries testing with NativeAOT #63781
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Reading beyond EOF should return 0 for FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING #63625
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringSyntaxAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Initial WASI support prototype #63890
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62816
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63739
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [RateLimiting] Dequeue items when queuing with NewestFirst #63377
    area-System.Threading
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection` #63836
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Replace "needs more info" label with "needs-author-action" #63899
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove mapfunc #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass #63814
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Address-expose locals under complex local addresses in block morphing #63100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tune floating-point CSEs live across a call better #63903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx #63803
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #62497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689

    area-System.Text.Json

  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
